# Overview
Mentron is an AI-powered Learning Management System (LMS) that helps students learn faster and saves teachers 11+ hours per week through intelligent automation.

# Core Features
- AI Quiz Generator: Auto-generate quizzes from any document (PDF, text, slides) in seconds
- Canvas LMS Integration: 5-minute setup, sync courses, rosters, assignments automatically
- FSRS Flashcards: Spaced repetition algorithm for optimal memory retention
- AI Mind Maps: Auto-generated visual concept maps for STEM subjects
- Auto-Grading: AI-powered grading with 95%+ accuracy, instant feedback
- Personalized Learning Paths: Adaptive AI adjusts content difficulty per student
- Chat with Documents: Ask questions about lecture notes, textbooks, PDFs

# Target Audience
- K-12 Schools and Teachers
- Universities and Colleges
- Corporate Training Departments
- Individual Students

# Key Differentiators
- Only LMS with FSRS spaced repetition built-in
- Native Canvas LMS integration (LTI 1.3)
- AI mind map generation from any course material
- 11+ hours/week time savings for teachers (verified case studies)
- 92% increase in student engagement (data from 50+ schools)

# Technology
- Next.js 15 frontend
- FastAPI backend
- PostgreSQL + Qdrant vector database
- OpenAI GPT-4 + Claude for content generation
- FSRS algorithm for flashcard scheduling
- LTI 1.3 standard for Canvas integration
